AUVSimulator package¶

Submodules¶

AUVSimulator.AUVSimulator module¶

AUVSimulator module simulates the data collection behaviour of an AUV in the mission. It only emulates the resulting trajectory of an AUV, not the detailed behaviour.

# Args: # __loc: current location at np.array([x, y]) # __loc_prev: previous location at np.array([xp, yp]) # __speed: speed of an AUV in m/s # __ctd_data: ctd measurements gathered along the trajectory.

class AUVSimulator.AUVSimulator.AUVSimulator¶

Bases: object

AUVSimulator.CTDSimulator module¶

CTDSimulator module simulates CTD sensor.

class AUVSimulator.CTDSimulator.CTDSimulator¶

Bases: object

CTD module handles the simulated truth value at each specific location.

Messenger module handles data sharing and message sharing functionality between each agent.
